General.Name: Kairuide Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Kairuide Holding Co.,Ltd. engages in trading of coal in China. It operates through three segments: Coal, Property Leasing, and Internet Acceleration. The company is involved in the procurement and sale of coal products; and external leasing and management of investment real estate. It also wholesales and retails coke, daily sundries, etc.; and provides internet traffic procurement and bandwidth optimization technical services, as well as metallic and non-metallic ores. The company was formerly known as Shandong Demian Incorporated Company and changed its name to Kairuide Holding Co.,Ltd. in November 2014. Kairuide Holding Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is based in Jingmen, China.
